title.rendered:
Wynn Resorts Releases New, Updated Images of Wynn Al Marjan Island


USA – English





Middle East – Arabic




Middle East – English

content.rendered:
Project Will Be the First Fully Integrated Resort in the MENA Region

RAS AL KHAIMAH, UAE, May 6, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Wynn Resorts, Limited (Nasdaq: WYNN) has released new images of its latest luxury resort, Wynn Al Marjan Island, currently under construction in Ras Al Khaimah, United Arab Emirates.

The development is the Company’s first beachfront resort and is being built on a beautiful island of almost 62 hectares jutting into the Arabian Gulf. Wynn Resorts is developing the project in partnership with Marjan and RAK Hospitality Holding. It is anticipated to be the first integrated gaming resort in the Middle East North Africa (MENA) region.






Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wynn-resorts-releases-new-updated-images-of-wynn-al-marjan-island-302136173.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
